product_name: Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP Trail-Running Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP trail-running shoes handle your all-terrain running thanks to aggressive traction, waterproof protection and responsive support. Breathable and lightweight polyester mesh uppers feature thermoplastic urethane overlays to secure insteps and lock heels down; protective toe and heel caps provide protection. ClimaShield(TM) waterproof breathable membranes keep the water from rain and puddles out of your shoes without sacrificing breathability. Lacing system takes just one pull for an exact fit; lace pocket hides lacing away. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from feet; contoured Ortholite(R) foam footbeds enhance comfort underfoot. Dual-density EVA midsoles deliver enhanced durability and cushioning for all-day comfort. Thermoplastic urethane midsole inserts supply protection and stability. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP trail-running shoes deliver sure traction on mixed terrain.
short_description: The Salomon XA Pro 3D Ultra CS WP trail-running shoes handle your all-terrain running thanks to aggressive traction, waterproof protection and responsive support.
